Hi,

Please see the welcome page on http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus

Server-side testing (as performed by Cactus) involves several
"components" that you can unit-test:
- JSPs
- Taglibs
- Servlets
- Filters
- EJBs

How would you unit test a method named someMethod(HttpServletRequest) of
your servlet for instance, with Junit? Answer: you cannot with pure
JUnit. You would need additional framework that will offer to you an
HttpServletRequest object (be it a fake one - as with the MockObjects
approach) or a real one (as with the Cactus in-container approach).

The same applies for the other types of J2EE components.

Hope it helps,
-Vincent
